title: Necropolis
desc:
Post 1722
- The owner of Necropolis is the owner of all Graveyards.
- As the owner, you know the contents of all Graveyards, and whenever you draw a card, you will instead be prompted to choose a card to resurrect from any Graveyard, removing it and adding it to your hand.
- You may also choose to draw a card the normal way instead.
